title: HIENA PRO Professional Hair Clippers Men Cordless Electric Beard Trimmer and Foil Shaver Set Home Hair Cutting Kit Type-C Rechargeable for Barber Clippers with LED Display
features: Complete Haircut Set: the hair clipper kit includes the hair cutter for men with four limiting combs (3,6,9,13) mm, the zero gap trimmer with limiting combs (1,2,3,4) mm, the skin fade shaver with a protective cover, the comb, the brush, the haircutting shawl, the three data cables, a small bottle of oil and a pair of black high-quality scissors, They are all packed in a beautiful black holdbag

High-Quality Blades: the hair cutting machine, electric beard trimmer and foil head shaver in this barber set are equipped with high-quality blades that are processed in several procedures, so they won't pull hair and beard, and you can enjoy a relaxing and comfortable haircutting and shaving experience

Professional Men's Hair Clipper Set: cordless hair cutting kit includes clippers for men haircut, Hair Trimmer and Aluminium Foil Shaver. The barber clippers come with adjustable blades to cut all types and lengths of hair with ease.The T-blade trimmer takes care of hair and facial beard detail. The foil razor is suitable for thick, short and full beards and the ultra-thin blade mesh provides a close shave

Powerful Motor and Low Noise: the cordless clippers, beard trimmer men and men's electric foil shavers in this barber set are equipped with durable and powerful motors that can easily cut different types of hair and beards and work with low noise

Smart LED Display: The hair machine men and moustache trimmer in this hair clipper kit from HIENA PRO both possesses smart LED screens which enable our users to see the percentage of battery life from 0 to 100, allowing our users to control the using time more accurately

Durable and Beautifully Designed: our HIENA PRO hair clipper kit professional and barbers are ergonomically designed for stability and comfort, reducing wrist fatigue and making it easy to comb your hair for long periods of time. The all gold coloured design is even a perfect gift for boyfriend, father, and friends

Previous page Next page 1 clipper 2 trimmer 3 shaver 4 Powerful motor 5 USB What is the quality of the blades on the barber machine and do they cut harder beards and hair? The blades of the HIENA PRO hair clipper machine have been carefully crafted through a number of processes to be sharp and cut safely, making it easy to remove even the toughest beards. Can I use my hair clipper while it's charging? Of course, our hair clippers men can be used corded or uncorded, so feel free to use them How the oil should be used in the hair clippers？ It is recommended to apply 2 to 3 drops of blade oil before and after cleaning to reduce friction, reduce heat, prevent rust and extend blade life. We hope you enjoy our products!
